# Window Warriors

Window Warriors is an American reality competition series on Game Show Network which premiered November 15, 2016.
Production
Garcelle Beauvais hosted the show, while Carson Kressley, Tai Beauchamp, and Douglas Little served as judges. The show featured eight "window merchandising designers" who competed in themed contests. The champion was awarded $100,000 and given a deal to architect a sizable New York store's holiday exhibit.

Episodes
| ShortSummary    = Contestants design showcases for a beautiful dress fit for a celebration.
| LineColor       = 006161
}}
| ShortSummary    = Contestants design their windows with materials by Lush.
| LineColor       = 006161
}}
| ShortSummary    = Contestants get assigned a team challenge and design their windows by Hot Topic and get to use live models in their windows.
| LineColor       = 006161
}}
| ShortSummary    = The remaining window designers showcase a cupcake company Sprinkles, that look good as they taste; tensions escalate between the contestants.
| LineColor       = 006161
}}
| ShortSummary    = The window designers compete in creative clothing challenge using re-produced material in their displays; a twist in the challenge.
| LineColor       = 006161
}}
| ShortSummary    = The three remaining window designers create two special holiday windows with help from past competitors.
